name: Sniggle: Savior of Snugs
description:
Sniggle: Savior of Snugs

Sniggle is a big snug with a big heart. Guide him through the universe and help him save his species.

You can download or listen to the Sniggle OST here.

This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 42! The theme of the competition was "running out of space."

Programming
Jimmy Cushnie - https://iamsodarncool.itch.io
Felipe Martinez - https://github.com/pipe01

Art
